title: PlayerNeutral
author: PlayerNeutral
content: I've been trying for days to withdraw my dogecoins without success from Mercatox, detail, this problem comes from last year with the covid. I waited for them to resolve it until today, however, until today the problem has not been resolved. I suggested paying for them to solve it, since then, they have already sent me to the technical department and higher, but so far they have not solved the problem..   I suggested that they send or exchange my dogecoins at market price, BTC 0.5 and pay for the losses I had sending money in the wallet, however they claim that the problem with doge will be solved soon, even though it's been more than a year since the problem.. I noticed contradictory things on the site, you can enter dogecoins on it, but you cannot withdraw or send to other users of the site.  https://i.imgur.com/ogvUtGF.pnghttps://i.imgur.com/JYZksRr.pnghttps://i.imgur.com/spMOYyk.pnghttps://i.imgur.com/nGSYzcq.pnghttps://i.imgur.com/K7isvj8.pngSite: https://mercatox.com/

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: That's already too long for a withdrawal request and they'll just tell you that they've sent it to the right department, I've never used mercatox but I saw people that have used them before and then has no problem with it. With what I know there, their reputation isn't really solid unlike the others.You can post a scam accusation on the appropriate section but we're not sure if that's going to have that assurance they'll allow this withdrawal of yours.Post it on Scam Accusations and then follow the format: Scam Report Format (Use it to make scam reports properly)

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: It's not surprising anymore if Mercatox scam their users because there's many accusations has been posted in this forum:1. MERCATOX POTENTIAL SCAM !!!!!!2. mercatox.com - Beware!3. Mercatox.com is a big SCAM !4. Blocking access to verified Mercatox account 5. My btc not confirmed for 24HRS/72 H MERCATOX MULTIPLE CASUALTIES SCAM MERCATOX? 6. MERCATOX BTC WITHDRAWAL I read your problem hasn't been solved for one year and they're scam you for high amount, IMO you can report to police or legal law to process this matter.

MERCATOX POTENTIAL SCAM !!!!!!2. mercatox.com - Beware!3. Mercatox.com is a big SCAM !4. Blocking access to verified Mercatox account 5. My btc not confirmed for 24HRS/72 H MERCATOX MULTIPLE CASUALTIES SCAM MERCATOX? 6. MERCATOX BTC WITHDRAWAL I read your problem hasn't been solved for one year and they're scam you for high amount, IMO you can report to police or legal law to process this matter.That's their problem, you don't know if they are a scammer or if they are bums, some problems were solved there, the transfer of nano, for obvious reasons, was always automatic. But I think it's better to call it a coup because they had to fix it.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Is this related to the doge network upgrade? Binance seems to have chosen a similar reason for suspending the doge withdrawal since about 1 year ago. Smelling somewhat fishy since doge's top pumping, the exchange's founders capitalized on this opportunity into third-party profit-making services behind the scenes which resulted in less liquid withdrawals.

comments.author: PlayerNeutral
comments.body: Quote from: noorman0 on December 13, 2022, 03:20:38 PMIs this related to the doge network upgrade? Binance seems to have chosen a similar reason for suspending the doge withdrawal since about 1 year ago. Smelling somewhat fishy since doge's top pumping, the exchange's founders capitalized on this opportunity into third-party profit-making services behind the scenes which resulted in less liquid withdrawals.I believe so, but being like this for more than a year is too much, because in other exchanges this has already been resolved.

If you're eligible to just get back your deposit, they should return it to you but they don't.This may happen for some that they're doing as if everything's normal but just like on your case, there could be some random customers that they're giving hard time.

But I think it's better to call it a coup because they had to fix it.The reason why I mention those accusations is you must do your own research before using any exchange, if you have googled about Mercatox reputation before using the service, you wouldn't face this kind issue.Quote from: PlayerNeutral on December 16, 2022, 12:45:45 PMWas it good? https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5428096.new#newNot good, actually it's similar with this thread. It's mean actually you should move this thread to scam accusations rather than open a new thread that contain a similar discussion. This forum has a rule to not post a duplicate thread since it's considered as spam.
